extendedInfo.description: Skullcandy presents...One App to Rule Them All. Giving you a 6 in 1 offering, combining the best of Music, Surf, Snow, Skate, MotoX and Video. There is nothing "lightâ about this app, and best of all it's completely FREE. We just want you to be happy. Wake up, check the conditions, crank the music, go shred.SURF- Up-to-the-minute conditions for surf locations across the entire world.- Favorite as many destinations as you like.- GPS search for the sickest waves nearest you.- All the meaty data you need, in a clean, fast-read layout.- Surf videos fed by SkullcandyTV.com- Powered by THE authority in surf...Surfline.comSNOW- Up-to-the-minute conditions on over 2,000 resorts worldwide.- 5-day forecast for all destinations- Monitor current weather, base depth, new snow in last 24hrs, and more.- Keep an eye on as many favorites as you like.- GPS locator to find the nearest slopes so you can shred faster.- Data rich with a clean design and intuitive layout.- Snow videos fed by SkullcandyTV.com- All Snow data viewable inside the app, for fastest reporting, no webpage rendering.- Powered by THE authority in snow...OnTheSnow.comSKATE- GPS skatepark finder for all 50 US states- Skatepark details including obstacles, fees, pad requirements etc.- Skate videos fed by SkullcandyTV.com- Powered by Skullcandy skate shredders.MUSIC- Streaming music from over 50 artists.- Tracks from Del the Funky Homosapien, 3 OH! 3, Ozomatli, Slightly Stoopid, Forever the Sickest Kids, Sean Fournier and at least 44 more.- Powered by Skullcandy rockersMOTOX- Powered by the authority in moto, Dirtlink.net- GPS track finder for all 50 US states- Track summary and details- All MotoX data viewable inside the appVIDEO- Custom video content created by Skullcandy video team,- Killer cutups of Action sports video for surf, skate, snow, ski, motoX, bmx and more.- Up-close backstage interviews with Musicians, Pro riders, Groms and Vets.- All video rendered inside the app, for quick viewing and easy use.WALLPAPERS AND URBAN ASSAULT- User submitted Wallpaper feed so you can keep your homescreen legit.- Choose from over 40 wallpapers, updated consistently.- User submitted Urban Assault pics so you can watch Skullcandy sticker the globe.

reviews.title: It\'s good
reviews.comment: But need a spot for our personal street spots and to have a finder for street spots. Plus needs to run better with music I\'ve got the sidekick 4g and it barely runs where I live even with wi-fi. So needs a few fixes but I love it. But fix the bugs please asap
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t even work!!
reviews.comment: This app is luckey to get 1* as it is pointless! I tried to view every section but says something about server. Not impressed >:|
reviews.author: Jordan Clow

reviews.title: Surf~Drive
reviews.comment: It gives decent surf reports near my favorite spots. The skatepark needs an update because of the parks going up so fast. In all my fav surf spots are atleast an forty-five minute drive so it works for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Is really a eye caching app but too slow and force closes alot
reviews.comment: Keeping it to test it out and see if is worth it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Really buggy, sever goes down all the time, don\'t bother with this til it gets fixed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would give it a better rate, but all it says is Loading and that\'s it. Tried to use it about 7 times b4 I removed it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not a big deal
reviews.comment: IM stuck on the load screen. honestly not a big deal for me though, the earphones are sick enough this was just a bonus. The day everything isn\'t marketed towards apple products will be a great day
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The app rarely works it has only worked twice for me. Its great when it works...plz fix it !!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keeps crashing
reviews.comment: Thought i would get this app as I\'ve just bought some SK Headphones. Unfortunately it keeps crashing when i click on music. The main thing you would use your headphones for really. Headphones 5 stars, app 1.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: The concept is pretty sick, but the execution leaves everything to be desired. Nothing works. Music gets stuck on the load screen, video and images return an error to the effect of *The server is whacked out to the gallery.\" seems like lots of folks with the same or similar problems. The app hasn\'t been updated since March 2011. I guess Skullcandy is done with it, so no point in downloading it. Bummer.
reviews.author: Seve Isaacs

reviews.title: Love skullcandy but big let down
reviews.comment: I am totally in love with skullcandy I own many pairs of earbuds including fmj\'s but I was disappointed in this app nothing loads and it freezed up my phone. LG Optimus S
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SUCKS !
reviews.comment: Again, says something about server prob. for ALL pages you try to access. WORTHLESS !!!
reviews.author: K. Danner

reviews.comment: I love this app I\'m a sevie but I want to work at this company and already going to spray paint my backpacks logo gold (SKDY backpack)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great concept
reviews.comment: Love the concept of this app able yo get the updates of surf conditions (dont surf but i do shore dive) and local hot spots but could you guys add a hot spot portion for sport bike rider\'s? Would be cool for people like me and my crew when we travel to find the local twisties in a convenient app like this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool App, but takes longer than usual to load
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its a good app but needs better music
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Excellent app. Never have i seen an app like this before. Yeah, its slow but the amount of content in it is ridiculous. Excellent. DROID.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lg G2x
reviews.comment: Dosent work at all on my lg g2x I recently got some gold lowriders great headfones btw but the app doesnt work at all no music no wallpaper no nothing well.keep till the.new version comes out but it that dont fix it I will uninstall
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crappy
reviews.comment: This is a sorry excuse for an app if i ever saw one. It won\'t load anything even if i\'m connected to WIFI.
reviews.author: Jessie Eichhorn

reviews.title: Nothing works
reviews.comment: On wifi and gps and 5 bars it tells me nothin worx and the data coming from their servers is \'wacked\'. Wack data for a wack app dont waste your time because this app is broken. Music doesnt load, tv data is wacked, web pages wont load. Fix your app.
reviews.author: A Google User
